properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_NAME , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , NICKNAME , ENROLL_DATE , POINT FROM MEMBER WHERE ADMIN = 'N' ORDER BY MEM_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_NAME , ADDRESS , PHONE , ENROLL_DATE , POINT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE ADMIN = 'N'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT O.OR_NO , O.MEM_NO , S.START_DATE , S.END_DATE , M.MEM_ID , M.MEM_NAME , M.EMAIL , M.PHONE , M.ADDRESS , M.POINT FROM OR_PRODUCT OP JOIN "ORDER" O ON (OP.OR_NO = O.OR_NO) JOIN SUBSCRIBE S ON(OP.OR_NO = S.OR_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(O.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) WHERE OR_CYCLE != 1 ORDER BY OR_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM OR_PRODUCT WHERE OR_CYCLE != 1
